allow: Bash(for file in Menubar/Menubar.tsx NavigationMenu/NavigationMenu.tsx HoverCard/HoverCard.tsx AlertDialog/AlertDialog.tsx Toast/Toast.tsx Carousel/Carousel.tsx)

Bash(then sed -i 's/backdrop-blur-md backdrop-saturate-200//g; s/backdrop-blur-md backdrop-saturate-100//g; s/bg-popover\\/85 text-popover/glass-popover text-popover/g; s/bg-popover\\/90 text-popover/glass-popover text-popover/g; s/bg-background\\/85/glass-popover bg-background\\/85/g; s/bg-background\\/80/glass-dialog bg-background\\/80/g; s/bg-card\\/60/glass-card bg-card\\/60/g; s/bg-black\\/50/glass-overlay/g' "$file")
